name: SwaiotHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Swaiot Home products help you control home appliance.You can simply ask Alexa to control your devices！

There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your device - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.
After connecting Alexa to your Swaiot Home products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Swaiot Home” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “Swaiot Home” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Swaiot Home" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “Swaiot Home” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on tv”
